thread.title: Police warn of West Side robberies
thread.title_full: Police warn of West Side robberies | Chicago Sun-Times

title: Police warn of West Side robberies
text:
Police are warning residents of a series of robberies over the past two weeks in the West Garfield Park and East Garfield Park neighborhoods on the West Side.
The burglaries occurred at 12:03 a.m. Sept. 20 in the 4300 block of West Washington Street and at 12:45 a.m. Oct. 1 in the 400 block of North Homan Avenue, according to a community alert from Chicago Police.
In both incidents, a suspect displayed a gun and took jewelry, wallets, money and credit cards, from people on the street, police said.
One suspect is described as 18-to-20-year-old black man with red dreadlocks.
Anyone with information about the robberies is asked to contact Area North Detectives at (312) 744-8263.
